transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir haan main kya bata rahi thi haan ye jaise maan lijiye ye category hoti hai hamari basically theek hai category ka matlab kya hota hai jaise category is the keywords theek hai agar maine Mindra pe maine search kiya men men jeans to men jeans to bahut aa jayenge na bahut company ke aa jayenge idhar theek hai to basically yahi hota hai ki main maan lijiye turmeric turmeric likha theek hai turmeric products to turmeric mein to kai sare aa jayenge na to aur bhi agar aur bhi keywords se search kar sakta hai na buyer to isliye maine yahan mapping bhi karna zaruri hota hai sir theek hai jisse aapke pass calls and queries aaye.
Customer: Okay okay chapter mein for example agar ye customer turmeric product karke search kara to hamara naam aa jayega.
Executive: Naam aapka nahi aayega haan naam naam in the sense naam to tab aayega na sir wo to show kar show hota hi hai mera matlab kya hai mera naam aa jayega haan product aapka aa jayega aapka to product aa jayega ye hota hai haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay ab isme ab ye jaise ye hai ye kya hai Durgilla turmeric finger theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab main dekhti hu isme koi agar available hai.
Customer: Number hi ja raha hai.
Executive: Actually ye secondary mapping ki jaati hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Just turmeric finger nikal ke dugira wala rakh dijiye.
Executive: Nahi sir shayad irrelevant nahi hai.
Customer: Ye variety type hai dugira wala variety type hai.
Executive: Ye ye variety hai matlab haldi ki.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye kar sakte hai aap turmeric products kar sakte hai aap lekin ye sahi mapping nahi hai.
Customer: Hume kuch to karke usko add kar sakte hai kya.
Executive: Haan nahi kuch bhi nahi karna hai sir agar aap kuch bhi add kar doge fir aapke pass galat leads aane lagenge na sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan to aapko sahi aur relevant cheez hi add karni hai aapne jaise yahan pe turmeric product kiya to hum yahan pe turmeric kuch bhi kar sakte hai sir rukiye main dikhati hu aapko.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Ye sari cheeze hoti hai sir thoda aapko profile ko aise karna padega na jaise thodi attractive dikhe sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur ye aur mujhe bataiye sir kaun hai main hu sir aapki manager.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Haan sari cheeze main hi karungi.
Executive: Basically aapko ye sari cheeze aise kar sakte hai dekho sir aapko kya hai na aapke jo products hmm ji boliye.
Executive: Jo products ki yahan pe basically sir kya hota hai na isme aapko description add karni hai apne hi product ka jo specifications hai na sari cheeze aapko mention karni padegi ab aapka product hai sir aapse behtar kaun jaan paega na sir.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haan to is in sari cheezon ko aap fill kar dijiyega theek hai description aapko describe kar dijiyega product ki quality kya hai kaise kya hai sari cheeze theek hai aur product ki pictures aap add kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai aur buyleads rahi buyleads ki baat main batati hu buyleads ka matlab kya hota hai buyleads hum kya aapko dikh kar rahe hai show bhi show karate hai rukiye ek second main aapko dikhati hu jaise maan lijiye ye hai hamara ye aapki aapke pass ye aaya Ladakh doom turmeric crop fingers karke ye aaya aapke pass leads Hyderabad Telangana se hai theek hai ab hum is pe aap apni apni order value dekh lenge yahan pe order value likhi rehti hai lekin inhone likh nahi rakha hai theek hai aap inse baat kar sakte hai pata nahi inki order value zyada bhi ho sakti hai kam bhi ho sakti hai ab inhone quantity likhi rakhi hai ye 25 kg chahiye mujhe theek hai haldi powder ab yahan pe aap contact buyer naam pe jayenge theek hai directly aapke wo contact ho jayega sir theek hai contact naam buyer pe click karenge to puri buyer ki details aayegi theek hai buyer ki kitni requirement hai wo bhi aayegi us pe click karke aapko directly contact kar sakte hai sir theek hai isse aapki lead consume ho jayegi sir theek hai aur yahan pe aap filter kar sakte hai ab jaise pan India deal kar rahe hai na all location laga ke ya apne near by ka location agar aapko dhundna hai ye laga ke theek hai category product ki kya hai kis category mein chahte hai aap turmeric finger dabaiye haan dabaya maine theek hai order value kya hona chahiye above 10000 ya 50000 theek hai ya above 1 lakh ya fir aapki quantity kya hai wo likh ke apne numbers mein bulk mein chahiye business mein chahiye jis tarah bhi aapko chahiye aapko yahan pe show karegi theek hai GST pe click kariye ek minute aapko agar koi doubt hai to aap inse baat kar lijiye.
Customer: GST pe to nahi available hai sir.
Executive: Ji okay GST pe click karke all India India dabaiye.
Customer: India.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: All India hi hai.
Customer: Oh okay okay.
Customer: Ab aap all India hi kar rahe ho na deal.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Achha all India location hai aapke near by to near by bhi kar rahe ho na kar hi rahe hoge sir ab ab mera doubt ye hai yahan pe requirement 29 hai jo dusra wala hai.
Executive: Ye buyer details hai sir ye ye buyer ki detail hai iska kya karoge sir iska batao ye aap kya hai requirements 29 haan matlab kya hai basically ye jo ye buyer ki detail hai jo aapko connect kar rahe hai na Jammu and Kashmir se ye inki detail hai sir ki inki jo requirement hai inka matlab jo buyer hai uski details kitni hai do saal se hai theek hai mushroom spawn ab button mushroom spawn in sab mein deal karte hai theek hai theek hai requirement inki jis product ke sath bhi inki hogi theek hai abhi tak unhone is wo number show kar raha hai inka replies inhone kitni di hai wo show kar raha hai sir theek hai available ka matlab kya hota hai

- Customer wants to know about turmeric product search.

- Customer wants to add Durgilla turmeric finger.

- Executive explained about product mapping.

- Executive explained about adding relevant products.

- Executive explained about profile attractive look.

- Executive explained about product description and specifications.

- Executive explained about buyleads and its filters.

- None
